Detailed Description

This interface provides a callback for collisions with terrain.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool Terrain::TerrainCollisionCallback::collide ( WorldTriangle const &  triangle,
float  tValue 
) [pure virtual]

This is the callback for terrain collisions.

Parameters:
triangle The impacted triangle.
tValue The t-value of collision (e.g. t-value along a line-segment or prism.
Returns:
True if the collision was accepted, false if more collisions are required.

Implemented in TerrainObstacleRayCallback, and TerrainObstaclePrismCallback.
